title: Automatio Chrome Extension
description: It's a well-designed chrome extension with a drag-&-drop interface to build a complete bot/web scraper without knowing a single line of code. The features are too many to list here. I developed the extension from the start. Of the 1.5 years of work there, "my favorite part was coming up with a solution to add support of shadow DOM, iframe, and lazy-loading which none of the competitors have yet. I've developed a deep understanding of the Javascript DOM while working on this project.

title: Automatio Dashboard
description: It‚Äôs the dashboard or control panel of the automatio app that runs in the cloud. Besides transforming the beautiful design into code I also worked on a whole lot of other things including building the notification system, optimizing the frontend and backend to show the output data(which can sometimes be over 30-40MB), improving a real-time ‚Äúoutput data‚Äù update system that shows scraped data as soon as it‚Äôs finished in the cloud. title: Landing page of an Agency
description: It's a concept of a landing page of an agency. I took the design from dribble and converted it into code. This was a great learning experience. This design has wavy and blob backgrounds and elements that are rarely seen in a standard website.

title: Google Keep React
description: It's a note taking app. I tried to clone google-keep. It has many useful features such as saving notes, organizing notes using categories, protecting notes using password, starring notes, modifying them. It also stores these notes in the browser storage so it stays even after you close the browser.
